attributes.description:
If you are reading this, it means you are now where you are supposed to be. You have worked hard and endlessly to find yourself in a position to buy your next vehicle. For most, buying a car is the most expensive purchase ever, so do it at a dealership you can trust and give you sound advice. At Mossel Bay VW, we are more than selling cars. We pride ourselves in giving our best for customer satisfaction and believe in building lifelong friendships and long-term business.

We do nation-wide deliveries and use several finance houses to ensure that you get the best deal.
	
Feel free to contact any of our well-trained sales professionals to assist you with your next purchase
Geeno Du Plessis 
Stuart Pypers 
Damiane Scott

Please feel free to contact us for any more info.

attributes.description:
OPTIONAL 12 MONTH WARRANTY AVAILABLE 

THIS VEHICLE IS IN GREAT CONDITION. A MUST SEE!!
COME AND VIEW!
WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE, SERVICE THE WHOLE OF THE GAUTENG REGION AND WE ARE BASED JUST 40 MIN FROM JHB.
FINANCE CAN BE ARRANGED!
TRADE-INS WELCOME!
Why you must buy from Koos&Mike used cars:
1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)
2. All our cars comes with a AA/DEKRA roadworthy certificate.
3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.
4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility in our town.
5. Finance approvals is our goal.
6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.
7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.
8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)
9. We buy decent cars for cash.
10. We make a video of the cars delivery as a gift to the client.
11. Ts & Cs APPLY

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment
